mapper.select: select sr.stu_id,s.stu_name,sr.course_id,course_record_id,sign_in,course_time_start,course_time_end from courserecord sr left join student s on sr.stu_id=s.stu_id left join course c on c.course_id=sr.course_id where sr.course_id=#{courseId}

select course_id,course_name,course_time_start,course_time_end,c.room_id,room_name,c.coach_id,coach_name, course_type,course_capacity,course_surplus from course c left join classroom cr on cr.room_id=c.room_id left join coach on c.coach_id=coach.coach_id where c.is_delete=0
AND coach_name like CONCAT('%',#{coachName},'%')
AND course_name like CONCAT('%',#{courseName},'%')
AND room_name like CONCAT('%',#{roomName},'%')
AND course_time_start = #{courseTimeStart}

select course_name,score,content,c.course_id,s.stu_id,s.stu_name,student_portrait, DATE_FORMAT(comment_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as time_end_str from course c left join courserecord cr on c.course_id=cr.course_id left join student s on s.stu_id=cr.stu_id where c.course_id=#{courseId} and cr.course_id is not null and cr.comment_time is not null
AND c.course_time_end < #{courseTimeStart}
